name: Prophecy Celestial, Ramiel

[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if your drop has five or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Pirate Swordsman, Colombard
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one card, discard it, and shuffle your deck. Then, call up to one card from your drop to (RC). This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Witch Doctor of Powdered Bone, Negrobone
effect: [ACT]Drop:[COST][Discard a card from your hand & put this card on the bottom of your deck], and call a grade 1 from your drop to (RC). If your drop has ten or more cards, you may call any grade instead.

name: Honorary Professor, Chatnoir
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, discard the top card of your deck, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's type. If this unit is on (VC), perform both regardless of the card type.
・Normal Unit-Choose two of your rear-guards, and they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. At the end of that turn, retire those units.
・Trigger Unit-Choose one of your rear-guards, and until end of turn, that unit can attack from the back row, and gets [Power] +5000. At the end of that turn, retire that unit.

name: Compass Lion
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):At the end of your turn, choose one of your rear-guards, and retire it. (This effect is mandatory)

name: Taping Cat
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC), or when this card is discarded from your deck, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and perform one of the effects below.
・Draw a card.
・Choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Gifted Dragon, Eikthlaera
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC) from hand, if you did not ride a grade 3 or greater unit this fight, perform one of the following.
・Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
・Choose one of your opponent's units, and it gets [Critical] -2 until end of that battle.
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your damage zone has no cards, put the top card of your deck into your damage zone.

name: Diligent Assistant, Minibelly
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC) from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a unit on an additional (RC), this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Hammsuke's Rival, Rocket Pencil Hammdon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit is placed on an additional (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a card from your hand into the soul], and that unit and this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If you have two or more additional (RC), draw a card.

name: Afflated Lemur
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, discard the top card of your deck, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's card type.
・Normal Unit‐[Soul-Charge 1].
・Trigger Unit‐[Counter-Charge 1].

name: Lycoris Musketeer, Vera
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire two rear-guards], choose two cards from your drop, put them on the bottom of your deck in any order, look at five cards from the top of your deck, choose up to two unit cards from among them, call them to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If you called two cards with "Musketeer" in their card names, this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.
[CONT](VC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, and "Lycoris Musketeer, Saul" is in your front row, all of your front row rear-guards get the [Power] this unit had got from trigger effects this turn.

name: Lycoris Musketeer, Saul
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Musketeer" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire a rear-guard], look at three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you called a trigger unit, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and activate all of that card's trigger effects. (Perform this trigger effect before other cards' abilities)

name: Water Lily Musketeer, Ruth
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), call up to one plant token to (RC). If your opponent's vanguard is grade 1 or greater, call up to two instead of one.
[AUTO](RC):When this unit or your other unit is placed on (RC) from your deck, [COST][retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Pure-hearted Flower Maiden, Fiorenza
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC) from hand, if you did not ride a grade 3 or greater unit this fight, perform one of the following.
・Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
・Choose one of your opponent's units, and it gets [Critical] -2 until end of that battle.
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your damage zone has no cards, put the top card of your deck into your damage zone.

name: Valkyrie of Reclamation, Padmini
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC) from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have two or more token units, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Peony Musketeer, Martina
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Retire a rear-guard], look at five cards from the top of your deck, call one card from among them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](RC):During the turn this unit was placed from the deck, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1.

name: Peony Musketeer, Toure
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire a rear-guard], look at three cards from the top of your deck, call two cards with "Musketeer" in their card names or any one card from among them to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Prophecy Celestial, Ramiel
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Counter-Charge 1]. Then, [Stand] all of your rear-guards with the same card name as a face up card in your damage zone. For every two units [Stand], draw a card, and all of your rear-guards get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC/RC):At the beginning of your ride phase, if your damage zone has four or more cards, you may put the top card of your deck into your damage zone. If you do, choose a card from your damage zone, put it into your hand, and if this unit is on your (RC), put this unit into your soul.

name: Revenger, Raging Form Dragon
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), if your damage zone has four or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one grade 2 or less card with "Revenger" in its card name, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][retire three rear-guards with "Revenger" in their card names], choose up to one grade 3 card with "Revenger" in its card name from your hand, and ride it as [Stand].

name: Bluish Flame Liberator, Prominence Core
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Retire a rear-guard], look at four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to two unit cards from among them, call them to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If "Bluish Flame Liberator, Percival" is in your soul, choose up to four cards instead of two cards.
[AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard is placed, until end of turn, that unit and this unit get [Power] +3000, if that unit is "Oath Liberator, Aglovale", and your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit's original [Critical] becomes two.

name: Sword Saint of Invincibility, Daihouzan
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, return it to their hand, until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +5000/drive +1, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater and they have one or less rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1.
[AUTO](VC):When your opponent's normal unit is placed on (RC) during their turn, if your opponent's hand has four or more cards, your opponent chooses a card from their hand, and discards it.

name: Ancient Dragon, Spinodriver
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit attacks from (VC) or is rode upon, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire two rear-guards], get an Imaginary Gift:Accel, draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC). Then, choose two of your units, and they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, put the top card of your deck face down as an equip gauge for this unit.

name: Ultimate Raizer Mega-flare
effect:
[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle your rear-guard with "Raizer" in its card name attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 2 & Rest] this unit], and [Stand] that unit and this unit.
[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have no [Stand] front row rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 2 card with "Raizer" in its card name from your soul, and ride it as [Stand]. At the end of that turn, choose a grade 3 card with "Raizer" in its card name from your soul, and ride it as [Rest].

name: Star-vader, Infinite Zero Dragon
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or rode upon, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and lock it. If your damage zone has four or more cards, choose one rear-guard from your opponent's front row and back row instead.
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each of your opponent's locked cards.

name: Blade Wing Reijy
effect:
[ACT](VC):If your soul has ten or less cards, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a card from your soul, and bind it face down.
[CONT](VC):Gain all of the following according to the number of face down cards in your bind zone.
・Five or more‐This unit gets [Power] +5000.
・Seven or more‐During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/drive +1.
・Ten or more‐During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +2.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if your bind zone has fifteen or more face down cards, choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and deal two damage.

name: Interdimensional Dragon, Chronoscommand Dragon
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], put all of your rear-guards on the bottom of your deck in any order, look at five cards from the top of your deck, choose any number of cards from among them, call them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, your opponent puts all of their rear-guards on the bottom of their deck in any order.

name: Young Pirate Noble, Pinot Noir
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 for every three trigger units in your drop.
